creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
FCKeditor doesn't use UUIDs for links and images. Therefore if anything moves,
all references need to be updated as well. This should change to using UUIDs
like BXE and Kupu.

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 19726
Uses UUIDs for link and images

Now uses UUIDs for links and images. Translation between URL and UUID is now
properly done between loading data into editor and saving to disk.
